results.content:
The course is outdated so I had to figure all the updates out my self. There are parts in the video which don't even apply to the students or there are options that the students don't get but the instructor has. Also I figured there would be more php and sql in this. That's what I really need to learn, but its really just all about myPhpAdmin and that's it! Instructor does not even go over what the triggers tab does in the application so i'm going to have to figure that out myself also. I left this course fairly empty handed when I consider what I expected to know which was every tab and every option in phpMyAdmin. Instead I only know about 70% of what phpMyAdmin probably does. Also it would have been nice to show how to update phpMyAdmin with a package manager like composer or npm too. Command line procedures on windows to make tasks easier & faster I am always interested in. 

There are bugs in myPhpAdmin also that need to be addressed. Alot of warnings come up that complain about apache and I have no clue what its saying. I would ask the instructor but does not look like she is active in the QnA so i'm not going to try. Also if you try to check Auto Increment & make it a primary key all in the same structure tab then it crashes. Nothing on how to read warnings or problems that could happen with answers to it are addressed. She just assumes you're going to use her outdated software that works for her only. 

I would like to new stuff on here in the future. If its going to be a course on phpmyadmin only then I think it should at least cover it as the up-to-date version. I feel like I got suckered. I think this should be a free course. Can't really say I am fully satisfied with this course in the way I have been with many others on here; so that is a first for me. I usually spot bad courses on sight. 

Other than all that the instructor has talent and I learned more about it being showed than I would have tinkering it by my self so I guess that's all that matters for now. However THE COURSE WAS NOT WORTH $20.00 !

Nothing on how to read warnings or problems that could happen with answers to it are addressed. She just assumes you're going to use her outdated software that works for her only.

I think this should be a free course. Can't really say I am fully satisfied with this course in the way I have been with many others on here; so that is a first for me. Other than all that the instructor has talent and I learned more about it being showed than I would have tinkering it by my self so I guess that's all that matters for now. However THE COURSE WAS NOT WORTH $20.00 !
